plot: James drives the controversial new BMW 1 Series hatchback. Richard splashes about in a supercharged Mercedes G-Wagen half-track, based on a 25-year-old German Army vehicle. Trinny and Susannah are the Stars In A Reasonably Priced Car.

James tests the new BMW 1-Series. Richard tests the new Mercedes-Benz G55 AMG. Jeremy and Richard have an argument to see which is the best hot hatchback, the Ford Fiesta ST 150 or the Citroen C2 VTS. Jeremy and James investigates whether cars that are made from the Pacific Rim (Korea, Malaysia etc.) are any good. Jeremy tests the Ariel Atom.—Caboose
